name: Poofers Poofected - Cog
text: This card cannot be Xyz Summoned. You can tribute this card; Special Summon up to 2 of your "Poofers" monsters that are in your GY or banished. (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Poofers" monster from your hand, field, or GY and target 1 Spell/Trap card on the field; return it to the top of the Deck. You can only activate each effect of "Poofers Poofected - Cog" once per turn.
